title: Gotham Central, Book One: In the Line of Duty
description: Collecting the first ten issues of the Eisner and Harvey Award-winning series.  Written by Ed Brubaker (Captain America) and Greg Rucka (52, DETECTIVE COMICS), this series pitted the detectives of Gotham City’s Special Crimes Unit against the city's greatest villains — in the shadow of Batman himself.
author: Ed Brubaker
